subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Vancouver Canucks’ road to the Stanley Cup finals has been defined not only by clutch goals and awe-inspiring team play, but also by the team’s passionate and unpredictable fans.
snippet: The Vancouver Canucks’ road to the Stanley Cup finals has been defined not only by clutch goals and awe-inspiring team play, but also by the team’s passionate and unpredictable fans.
